code: export var BASE_URL='http://api.mstar.students.nomoredomainsmonster.ru';export var register=function register(email,password){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(function(res){console.log("register",res.token);checkResponse(res);});};export var authorize=function authorize(password,email){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({password:password,email:email})}).then(function(res){console.log("authorize",res.token);checkResponse(res);});};export var checkToken=function checkToken(token){return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json',Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(function(res){return checkResponse(res);});};var checkResponse=function checkResponse(res){if(!res.ok){console.error("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(res.status));return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430 ".concat(res.status));}return res.json();};
